plot outline: Eswar is brought up by his grandfather(Poo Ramu) in his village. Eswar falls for Amrutha (Anjali Nair), who also belongs to the same village. When his grandfather comes to know about his love on Amrutha , he warns him that it isn't the right time to go behind her, as his family needs his strong support. What did he decide? Did he go with Amrutha or stay with his family is the rest of the story.
title: Nedunalvaadai
plot: An unemployed youngster is at the crossroads, puzzled about choosing between family and love.

Eswar is brought up by his grandfather(Poo Ramu) in his village. Eswar falls for Amrutha (Anjali Nair), who also belongs to the same village. When his grandfather comes to know about his love on Amrutha , he warns him that it isn't the right time to go behind her, as his family needs his strong support. What did he decide? Did he go with Amrutha or stay with his family is the rest of the story.
